overview:
Alessandro is the creator of Lightstreamer, a software solutions that enables the Real-Time Web.

Alessandro was born in Milan and graduated in Computer Engineering at Politecnico di Milano and in General Management at SDA Bocconi. He started his career as a researcher and teacher at CEFRIEL, an organization focused on strengthening existing ties between academic and business worlds in innovative ICT sectors. He created several financial trading platforms at Sol-Tec as a Client Delivery Manager. Alessandro designed Lightstreamer and has been leading its development at Weswit as the CTO and Co-CEO.
